thread.title: British ISIS fighter who died in a suicide bomb attack on Iraqi forces in Mosul is former Guantanamo Bay detainee Ronald Fiddler
thread.title_full: British ISIS fighter who died in a suicide bomb attack on Iraqi forces in Mosul is former Guantanamo Bay detainee Ronald Fiddler

author: Neal Baker
title: British ISIS fighter who died in a suicide bomb attack on Iraqi forces in Mosul is former Guantanamo Bay detainee Ronald Fiddler
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments A BRITISH jihadi who blew himself up in a suicide attack on Iraqi troops in Mosul has been named as Ronald Fiddler, it has been claimed. 
The former Guantanamo Bay detainee, revealed by respected BBC journalist Steve Swann, was filmed driving a death car packed with explosives at an army position in near the ISIS stronghold in Iraq on Monday. Twitter 1 British ISIS fighter Ronald Fiddler, who called himself Abu Zakariya al-Britani, smiles before killing himself in a suicide attack in Mosul 
Fiddler, who also went by the name Jamal Al-Harith, had been handed Â£1m by the British government after being released from the US detention centre in 2004. 
But the brainwashed fighter fled the UK to fight in Syria in 2014 as the militant group swept across the region. 
For the latest news on this story keep checking back at Sun Online, where we will bring you live updates as soon as they happen, before anyone else.
